CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
OldVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Goal Customization in Copilot in Viva Goals
CurrentVersion.description: Enhancements to Viva Goals Copilot to better support customized terminology. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Goal Customization in Copilot in Viva Goals
OldVersion.description: Enhancements to Viva Goals Copilot to better support customized terminology.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Request License for Others
CurrentVersion.description: This feature enables all unlicensed users to request a license from their IT Admin. IT Admins see these requests in MAC and either approve or decline them. Today, unlicensed users who get errors while trying to sign in cannot proceed. With this feature, they can at least express intent to their IT Admin to start using Goals. Also, Org Admins can now request licenses for all unlicensed users in their Goals Organizations, thus unblocking them from using Goals. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Request License for Others
OldVersion.description: This feature enables all unlicensed users to request a license from their IT Admin. IT Admins see these requests in MAC and either approve or decline them. Today, unlicensed users who get errors while trying to sign in cannot proceed. With this feature, they can at least express intent to their IT Admin to start using Goals. Also, Org Admins can now request licenses for all unlicensed users in their Goals Organizations, thus unblocking them from using Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Improved FRE for new Goals users
CurrentVersion.description: New users to Goals will have an easier onboarding with low confusion on their first sign-in. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Improved FRE for new Goals users
OldVersion.description: New users to Goals will have an easier onboarding with low confusion on their first sign-in.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New users can auto-claim licenses
CurrentVersion.description: By creating the Auto-claim policy for any product, IT Admins will enable eligible new users to claim a license to the product when they sign in. This removes the dependency on the IT Admin and provides a seamless experience to end users. Viva Goals will be onboarded to this platform. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New users can auto-claim licenses
OldVersion.description: By creating the Auto-claim policy for any product, IT Admins will enable eligible new users to claim a license to the product when they sign in. This removes the dependency on the IT Admin and provides a seamless experience to end users. Viva Goals will be onboarded to this platform.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot assisted goal update in Viva Goals
CurrentVersion.description: Easily generate a draft update for a goal with less effort by synthesizing progress and status and form subgoals and related work tailored to your preferences through a selection of dynamic check-in templates. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot assisted goal update in Viva Goals
OldVersion.description: Easily generate a draft update for a goal with less effort by synthesizing progress and status and form subgoals and related work tailored to your preferences through a selection of dynamic check-in templates.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - M365 Copilot plugin to search and catch up on goals
CurrentVersion.description: The M365 Copilot plugin for Viva Goals empowers you to effortlessly search and pull quick summaries of your team's OKRs right within Teams. Stay ahead of the game by identifying key risks based on the progress and status of your team's OKRs, all seamlessly integrated into the flow of work. Unleash the potential of combining Viva Goals data with M365 information, providing your team with a holistic view for improved productivity and collaboration. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - M365 Copilot plugin to search and catch up on goals
OldVersion.description: The M365 Copilot plugin for Viva Goals empowers you to effortlessly search and pull quick summaries of your team's OKRs right within Teams. Stay ahead of the game by identifying key risks based on the progress and status of your team's OKRs, all seamlessly integrated into the flow of work. Unleash the potential of combining Viva Goals data with M365 information, providing your team with a holistic view for improved productivity and collaboration.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Microsoft Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Microsoft Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
OldVersion.description: Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Revamped Resources on mobile and tablet
CurrentVersion.description: The Resources section on Viva Connections mobile and tablet will show content from the recently revamped Resources section on Viva Connections desktop.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Revamped Resources on mobile and tablet
OldVersion.description: The Resources section on Viva Connections mobile and tablet will show content from the recently revamped Resources section on Viva Connections desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Improved elevation detection
CurrentVersion.description: This improvement expands the types of elevation actions in Windows that EPM can detect and control elevation for.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Improved elevation detection
OldVersion.description: This improvement expands the types of elevation actions in Windows that EPM can detect and control elevation for.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment
CurrentVersion.description: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment (ADE) ensures targeted apps and policies can get to devices faster and reduce latency of device setup. ETG will only be part of new iOS/iPadOS enrollment policies. Admins can add a static Entra ID group into the enrollment policy, so devices will be part of that group upon enrollment, reducing latency of targeted policies and apps.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment
OldVersion.description: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment (ADE) ensures targeted apps and policies can get to devices faster and reduce latency of device setup. ETG will only be part of new iOS/iPadOS enrollment policies. Admins can add a static Entra ID group into the enrollment policy, so devices will be part of that group upon enrollment, reducing latency of targeted policies and apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Security Baselines for HoloLens 2
CurrentVersion.description: These security baselines represent Microsoft’s best practice guidelines and experience from deploying and supporting HoloLens 2 devices to customers across various industries.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Security Baselines for HoloLens 2
OldVersion.description: These security baselines represent Microsoft’s best practice guidelines and experience from deploying and supporting HoloLens 2 devices to customers across various industries.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enrollment time grouping for Android Enterprise Corporate devices
CurrentVersion.description: Enrollment time grouping for Android Enterprise Corporate devices ensures targeted apps and policies get to devices faster and reduce latency of device setup.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enrollment time grouping for Android Enterprise Corporate devices
OldVersion.description: Enrollment time grouping for Android Enterprise Corporate devices ensures targeted apps and policies get to devices faster and reduce latency of device setup.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Copilot assisted catch up on important work related to goals
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Viva Goals helps users in finding and catching up on documents, meetings, chats, emails, and work related to all or a subset of the goals in view. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Copilot assisted catch up on important work related to goals
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Viva Goals helps users in finding and catching up on documents, meetings, chats, emails, and work related to all or a subset of the goals in view

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Copilot assisted summarization and catch up on goals
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Viva Goals helps you save time by generating a comprehensive summary with tone, length of your preference for one or more goals in the view, allowing you to quickly catch up on and share your goal status and progress with leaders, stakeholders, and your team. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Copilot assisted summarization and catch up on goals
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Viva Goals helps you save time by generating a comprehensive summary with tone, length of your preference for one or more goals in the view, allowing you to quickly catch up on and share your goal status and progress with leaders, stakeholders, and your team

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
OldVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work Hours and Location in My Day
CurrentVersion.description: Work Hours and Location information will now be available in My Day pane in Outlook when using agenda view. Users will be able to update their Work Hours and Location information from My Day and also see who is coming to Office. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Work Hours and Location in My Day
OldVersion.description: Work Hours and Location information will now be available in My Day pane in Outlook when using agenda view. Users will be able to update their Work Hours and Location information from My Day and also see who is coming to Office. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for leaders in Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Empower leaders to ask questions about their organization and how their team is doing through responses that leverage Viva Insights behavioral metrics and organizational context data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for leaders in Viva Insights
OldVersion.description: Empower leaders to ask questions about their organization and how their team is doing through responses that leverage Viva Insights behavioral metrics and organizational context data.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Categorize single items in conversation view in new Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: This functionality will allow users to categorize individual emails within the conversation view, enhancing organization and tracking. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Categorize single items in conversation view in new Outlook for Windows and Web
OldVersion.description: This functionality will allow users to categorize individual emails within the conversation view, enhancing organization and tracking. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Support for Document Property Predicate on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend the condition 'Document Property is' to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Support for Document Property Predicate on Endpoint DLP
OldVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend the condition 'Document Property is' to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Approvals integration in Document Libraries
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Document Libraries will begin to leverage the Approvals app in Microsoft Teams. Users will be able to navigate to the Automate dropdown, Configure Approvals to enable the feature on the library. Once enabled you can specify the approver for the file, submit a request which will appear in the Approvals app in Teams or can be approved directly in the library. Once approved, the file metadata will update in the Approval status column.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Approvals integration in Document Libraries
OldVersion.description: SharePoint Document Libraries will begin to leverage the Approvals app in Microsoft Teams. Users will be able to navigate to the Automate dropdown, Configure Approvals to enable the feature on the library. Once enabled you can specify the approver for the file, submit a request which will appear in the Approvals app in Teams or can be approved directly in the library. Once approved, the file metadata will update in the Approval status column.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sync folder order
CurrentVersion.description: The order of folders in Outlook mobile will now sync to match the folder order on other Outlook apps.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Sync folder order
OldVersion.description: The order of folders in Outlook mobile will now sync to match the folder order on other Outlook apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to request delegate access in Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights users will now be able request delegate access from a Manager in the Insights Teams or Web app. Previously, Managers could assign delegates, but potential delegates could not request access from a Manager. This request access update will allow for increased ease & flexibility of providing delegate access in Insights.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to request delegate access in Viva Insights
OldVersion.description: Viva Insights users will now be able request delegate access from a Manager in the Insights Teams or Web app. Previously, Managers could assign delegates, but potential delegates could not request access from a Manager. This request access update will allow for increased ease & flexibility of providing delegate access in Insights.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Auto detection of room audio in BYOD rooms expanded to audio devices with video
CurrentVersion.description: The room audio auto-detect and pre-select feature for BYOD rooms that was released in October 2024 now activates the video component of composite audio-video peripherals as the selected camera in Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Auto detection of room audio in BYOD rooms expanded to audio devices with video
OldVersion.description: The room audio auto-detect and pre-select feature for BYOD rooms that was released in October 2024 now activates the video component of composite audio-video peripherals as the selected camera in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Python in Excel for the web
CurrentVersion.description: Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature update, eligible users will now be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks in Excel for the web. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.

OldVersion.title: Excel: Python in Excel for the web
OldVersion.description: Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature update, eligible users will now be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks in Excel for the web. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Third-Party chat and meeting keyboard shortcut support
CurrentVersion.description: Users familiar with keyboard shortcuts used in 3rd party applications chat and meeting applications can utilize the same shortcuts in Teams. To do this, access the keyboard shortcuts dialog from the Settings and more button in the upper right, and select a communication or meeting layout. This enables users to apply the shortcuts they are accustomed to from 3rd party chat and meeting applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Third-Party chat and meeting keyboard shortcut support
OldVersion.description: Users familiar with keyboard shortcuts used in 3rd party applications chat and meeting applications can utilize the same shortcuts in Teams. To do this, access the keyboard shortcuts dialog from the Settings and more button in the upper right, and select a communication or meeting layout. This enables users to apply the shortcuts they are accustomed to from 3rd party chat and meeting applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Enrichment of Messages in Business Chat
CurrentVersion.description: This feature is designed to enhance your communication experience by making it easier to understand and interact with your chat messages in Business Chat. With this feature, you will see cards and hoverable experiences that provide additional details of the chat without leaving your current view. This means you can quickly grasp the context of your conversations and find the information you need more efficiently.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite – Remote Help supports multi-session AVD
CurrentVersion.description: Remote Help supports AVD sessions with 1 user on 1 VM today. This feature will enable support for multi-session AVD with several users on 1 VM.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues App to add Monitor Whisper Barge and Takeover
CurrentVersion.description: Authorized users will be able to enter into a monitoring session with selected agents for private coaching. They can listen to customer calls, whisper to the agents for private message, even barge into or takeover the call.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - bulk data export
CurrentVersion.description: Support for bulk export of device status, including username, sync app version, known folders, last sync date, and sync errors.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - bulk data export
OldVersion.description: Support for bulk export of device status, including username, sync app version, known folders, last sync date, and sync errors.
